titleStmt.title: A short account from, and description of the Isthmus of Darien, where the Scots Collony are settled With a particular map of the Isthmus and enterence to the river of Darien. According to our late news, and Mr. Dampier and Mr. Wafer.
titleStmt.author: Wafer, Lionel, 1660?-1705? aut
Dampier, William, 1652-1715. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: printed: and sold by John Vallange, at his shop on the north-side of the street, a little above the Cross: and by James Wardlaw, at his shop in the Parliament Closs. Price 7 pence,

notesStmt.note: Caption title on p. 1 reads: A short description of the Isthmus of Darien, [et]c:.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
